subject: Running
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Kara Goucher surged ahead in the final half-lap to win the first major race of her career in the 5,000 meters. Her husband, Adam, was not as lucky.
snippet: Kara Goucher surged ahead in the final half-lap to win the first major race of her career in the 5,000 meters. Her husband, Adam, was not as lucky.
